text.autoconfig.Horses.title: Horses Config
text.autoconfig.Horses.option.noWander.@:
Yes - saddled horses wont wander.
No - saddled horses will wander
text.autoconfig.Horses.option.breakSpeed:
Yes - Allows mining at full speed while on horseback.
No - Dramatically slows mining speed while on horseback (vanilla behavior)
text.autoconfig.Horses.option.stepHeight:
Yes - Increases horse stepheight from 1 block to 1.1 blocks, making travel much smoother around path blocks.
No - vanilla behavior
text.autoconfig.Horses.option.noBuck.@To:
Yes - Prevents horses from randomly bucking while mounted, no more random stops!
No - vanilla behavior
Yes - Lets horses, mules, and donkeys swim when you are riding them.
No - Horses, mules, and donkeys sink when you ride them in water (vanilla behavior)
Yes - Lets camels swim when you are riding them.
No - Camels sink when you ride them in water (vanilla behavior)
text.autoconfig.Horses.option.swimDead.@:
Yes - Lets Skeleton and Zombie horses swim when you are riding them.
No - Skeleton and Zombie horses sink when you ride them in water (vanilla behavior)
When mounted, the horse gets more transparent the further you look down

The horse wont be faded above this angle
looking below it will start decreasing opacity
Below this angle the horse is as transparent as it will get

How transparent the horse can get
100 is invisible
text.autoconfig.Horses.option.horseHeadA:
When mounted, horse heads are angled an extra N degrees down
   0 is disabled
   30 is good for visibility and style
   45 is good for breaking necks
